## Summary
Brief description of the changes.

## Related Issue(s)
- Closes #[issue number]

## Changes
- [ ] Feature / Fix / Refactor
- [ ] Tests added / updated
- [ ] Documentation updated

## Motivation
Why are these changes needed?

## Verification / Testing
Steps to verify the changes:

```bash
cargo build
cargo test
cargo run -- --config config/default.toml
